name: Mega Kinetic
description:
When an alien lifeform needs to bounce to survive, science abides. 

Play as a scientist-turned-athlete who must slam, boop and bump a specimen across the arena to keep it alive. Should it bounce on the ground more than once, it - along with your groundbreaking scientific findings - will perish. 

Made for Ludum Dare 46. 

You can find us on Twitter at:

@AdoneKitching | @BsMcInnes 

SFX by Jason Sutherland. 
'Age of Innovation' track by https://www.purple-planet.com/
